title: Professional Summary
text:

title: Bowen de Gouw‚Äôs Website
text:
Kia Ora, Thank you for visting my website!
Kia ora and welcome! I‚Äôm Bowen ‚Äî a lifelong learner, student-athlete, and data-driven problem solver. I was born in the Netherlands, raised in New Zealand, and for now call Boston home. My journey across continents has shaped how I think, lead, and connect with others.
Growing up on Auckland‚Äôs North Shore, I learned to balance curiosity and discipline ‚Äî two traits that came from equal parts academics and athletics. At Westlake Boys High School, one of New Zealand‚Äôs top-performing schools, I discovered my passion for both numbers and teamwork.
In my final year of high school, I earned an athletic scholarship to Boston University, joining the Men‚Äôs Rowing Team. At 18, I packed my bags and crossed the world, driven by the goal of earning a world-class education and competing at the highest collegiate level.
Four years later ‚Äî countless early mornings, races, and study sessions later ‚Äî I graduated from the Questrom School of Business with a BSBA and a deep appreciation for resilience, leadership, and collaboration.
After graduation, I wanted to sharpen my technical toolkit and bridge the gap between business insight and data analytics. That led me to pursue a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics (MET, Boston University) ‚Äî a program designed to explore predictive modeling, data mining, cloud platforms, and machine learning.
My goal is to use these tools to make data more human ‚Äî helping organizations uncover insights that improve performance, experience, and impact.





Celebrating my Graduation from Boston University‚Äôs DeWolfe Boathouse, May 2025








Preparing for the Inter-Collegiate Rowing Association (IRA) National Championships, May 2025

title: Certifications
text:
Below are verified certifications that reflect my passion for applying technology and data to real-world business challenges.



Amazon Web Services (AWS) / Credly ‚Ä¢ I‚Äôm thrilled to announce that I have successfully completed the AWS Academy Cloud Foundations** training, earning a verified badge from Amazon Web Services (AWS)!
This program provided me with a strong understanding of the core concepts of cloud computing, including AWS services, architecture, security, and pricing.
It was an incredible learning journey that deepened my skills in cloud technologies and gave me a clearer understanding of how they drive innovation and digital transformation.
üîó View Verified Badge on Credly




**Bloomberg for Education ‚Ä¢
An intensive, self-paced certification course that introduces the core pillars of the financial markets ‚Äî economics, currencies, fixed income, and equities ‚Äî through the Bloomberg Terminal.
This certification strengthened my financial literacy, market awareness, and analytical capabilities in interpreting financial data and trends.
üîó View Certificate
